text: Ravil Ulfatovich Maganov (, ; 25 September 1954 â€“ 1 September 2022) was a Russian businessman. He was the chairman of the national oil company Lukoil. On 1 September 2022, Maganov died after falling from a sixth-floor window at a hospital in Moscow, Russia at the age of 67. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Russian businesspeople Category:Deaths from falls
title: Ravil Maganov
